_header: This babe to us that now is born
_description: A Christmas carol — five six-line stanzas (ababcc) with three-line refrain, ‘And thus it is / forsothe iwys / He askyth nouth but that is hys’ and burden: ‘Now may we syngyn as it is / Quod puer natus est nobis’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
This babe to vs now is bornWonderful werkis he hath
                    wrowght…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…And thus it is for soth ywysHe asketh no thynge but þat
                    is hisExplicit

CamTCC1230.First Lines:
This babe to vs þat now is boreWundyrful werkys he hath i
                    wrotht…
CamTCC1230.Last Lines:
…Thy mercy may al woo make fleAnd daungerous dreed fro vs do
                    sterte
